sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish interviewee's background, current responsibilities, and familiarity with observability tooling in regulated environments.
sample_questions: Can you briefly describe your current role and main responsibilities at your last project?
What prior experience do you have with OpenTelemetry or similar instrumentation frameworks?
How do you adapt DevOps practices when working in regulated industries?

sections.title: Project-Specific Technical Deep Dive
sections.goal: Explore candidate's approach to implementing observability pipelines and meeting defined SLOs for Nimbus Observability.
sample_questions: How would you design the ingestion pipeline for metrics, logs, and traces in Nimbus Observability?
What strategies would you use to ensure SLO compliance, e.g., SLA-HEL-01 style guarantees?
Can you walk me through a runbook you might create for alert fatigue tuning, referencing RB-OBS-033?

sections.title: Cross-Project Integration & Dependencies
sections.goal: Assess ability to identify and manage dependencies with other Novereon projects such as Helios Datalake or Poseidon Networking.
sample_questions: How would the observability signals from Poseidon Networking's mTLS policies inform incident analytics in Nimbus?
Can you describe a data flow from Helios Datalake ingestion through to Nimbus Observability dashboards?
What challenges arise when integrating telemetry from multiple sources with different retention policies?

sections.title: Automation & Infrastructure as Code
sections.goal: Evaluate automation mindset, IaC tooling, and deployment strategies for observability components.
sample_questions: Which IaC tools would you choose for deploying OpenTelemetry collectors and why?
How would you automate the deployment of alerting rules and dashboards across environments?
Can you cite an example where automation reduced MTTR in a previous project?

sections.title: Incident Response & Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Understand runbook use, postmortem culture, and continuous optimization of observability systems.
sample_questions: How would you handle a sudden spike in false-positive alerts in Nimbus?
What metrics would you track post-incident to ensure improvements are effective?
Have you worked with RFC processes like RFC-1114 to formalize changes in observability strategy?

sections.title: Risk Assessment & Decision-Making
sections.goal: Probe candidate's ability to balance trade-offs, manage risks, and make evidence-based decisions.
sample_questions: If you had to choose between higher sampling rates and cost constraints, how would you decide?
How do you assess the blast radius when changing telemetry configurations?
Describe a time when you made a risk-based decision regarding observability coverage.

sections.title: Wrap-Up & Cultural Fit
sections.goal: Gauge alignment with Novereon Systems GmbH's values and mission.
sample_questions: How do you embody 'Safety First' in your day-to-day work?
What does 'Sustainable Velocity' mean to you in the context of DevOps and observability?
Why do you want to work on Nimbus Observability at Novereon?
